content: * if you download for free please consider following me on instagram @sachikobee 1 to help grow my pattern business thx * a good next pair after your basic vanilla sock the humber socks have a little bit of a stitch pattern that is easily memorized after a few rounds pattern is written for 4 ply sock yarn and double pointed needles and is available in 3 sizes finished measurements leg circumference approx 18 20 5 23 cm/ 7 8 9 ins materials 1 skein of 4 ply sock yarn/ fingering weight yarn approx 100 g/ 3½ oz and 400 m/ 437 yds 2 5 mm/ us 1½ double pointed needles or size required to achieve correct gauge 8 stitch markers and 1 removable stitch marker to mark beg of round - this is optional yarn needle gauge 36 sts and 48 row = 10 cm/ 4 ins over stockinette stitch after blocking adjust needle size to obtain correct gauge 1 https //www instagram com/sachikobee/
